name: Anonymous
comment: We can kind of relate to the struggle with Observer power due to our memory of the exile but we should also remember that their power twists and corrupts the forms and minds of those who use it. So I think we can talk to Freya about it but we should be very cautious. Maybe through some celestial shenanigans we can purify her if our cautionary tale learned from our flashback experience as the exile convinces her that Observer power is bad juju.
